values: 令人尴尬的；使人难堪的；难为情的；难对付的；难处理的；局促不安的；不方便的；棘手的 （工作）；笨拙的；不雅观的；不舒适的

synonym.mean: 尴尬的；笨拙的；棘手的；不合适的

adv. 向下；适用于（某一等级制度下的或一群人中的）每一个人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重通过直觉或理性感觉意识到某物的存在。 awkward, clumsy
指内心的感觉，强调深刻的心理活动。
侧重缺乏优雅、机敏和技巧。用于物时，指使用不便。
强调通过耳闻目睹或感觉而得到的信息，也指敏税的观察和推断。侧重感知，多与of一起用。
指人时，侧重行动笨拙；指物时，侧重制作粗陋或体积、重量过大而呈现笨重。

word_group.brief_definition: 尴尬地位；尴尬境地；尴尬处境

bilingual.source: Watching the awkward scene made her cringe.
bilingual.target: 看着那个尴尬的场景让她感到畏缩。

bilingual.source: He found himself in an awkward predicament.
bilingual.target: 他发现自己陷入了一个尴尬的窘境。

bilingual.source: He always finds himself in awkward situations.
bilingual.target: 他总是发现自己处于尴尬的情形。

bilingual.source: The conversation was stifled by the awkward silence.
bilingual.target: 谈话因尴尬的沉默而被压抑了。

bilingual.source: His prudery often led to awkward social interactions.
bilingual.target: 他的假正经常常导致尴尬的社交互动。

bilingual.source: His gauche mannerisms often led to awkward situations.
bilingual.target: 他的笨拙举止经常导致尴尬的局面。

bilingual.source: Sometimes a fib can save you from an awkward situation.
bilingual.target: 有时候一个小谎言可以让你摆脱尴尬的局面。

bilingual.source: There was an awkward silence after he asked the question.
bilingual.target: 他问完问题后，场面陷入了尴尬的沉默。

bilingual.source: He tried to extricate himself from the awkward situation.
bilingual.target: 他试图解救自己摆脱尴尬的局面。

bilingual.source: She filled the conversation with blah to avoid awkward silence.
bilingual.target: 她用无聊的或无意义的话填补了对话，以避免尴尬的沉默。

list.abstract: awkward（英[ˈɔːkwəd]，美[ˈɔːkwərd]），英语单词，形容词，为困难的；棘手的；尴尬的。短语搭配有awkward situation（尴尬的情况）。例句为“He fended off the awkward questions.（他避开了那些尴尬的问题。）” awkward相关近义词有testing、embarrassed，相关反义词有graceful。

yingyinNormal.en: Penny with a new guy, tres awkward. It wasn't awkward. It wasn't fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮有了新男友，非常尴尬。没什么尴尬的，不过也不算好玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, then I anticipate an awkward situation when you get home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我预测你回家会面临个尴尬的境地。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, dear. What an awkward situation. You're not offended? Why no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，亲爱的，多么令人尴尬的情景啊，你不会生气吧？怎么会？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, Cam. It's not gonna happen. Coach, can I come in yet? See, now you've put me in an awkward position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，小卡，这事没得商量。教练，我能进来了吗？看，你现在害我陷入一个很尴尬的局面。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. We're, going to the movies. No, we're not. We're standing in the hallway, suffering through an awkward encounter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿。我们赶着去看电影。才怪，我们站在走廊里忍受你们尴尬的相遇。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, But I'm given to understand that when you have something awkward to discuss with someone, it's more palatable to preface it with banal chit chat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，不过我觉得如果你要和某人谈一个很尴尬的问题之前，最好跟他说几句不搭界的闲话。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, it's awkward. It's awkward. It's awkward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真尴尬，尴尬，尴尬。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this is super awkward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真是尴尬到爆。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, feeling the awkward now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我能感到尴尬了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is really awkward. Oh, and I can leave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，气氛有点尴尬。哦, 这儿没我的事儿了。

yingyinNormal.en: We make everyone feel awkward. That's our thing!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们让所有人感到尴尬，这是我们的特色啊！

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, awkward question. The hospital knows you took two, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有点尴尬，不过医院知道你们拿了两个回来是吧？

yingyinNormal.en: This is super awkward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真是尴尬到爆了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ha. This is awkward. Not you're awkward, but just because we're... I'm awkward. You're gorgeous. Wait, what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这有点尴尬，你不需要觉得尴尬，但我们确实.. 至少我这样觉得。你很漂亮，等等，什么?

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I'm glad you guys are past that little awkward phase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恭喜你们度过尴尬期。

yingyinNormal.en: So, this wasn't the awkward part? No. Oh, all right. S'up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是说刚才那还不算尴尬事了？不算。那好吧，咋了？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, can I talk to you about something? It's a little awkward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能跟你谈件事吗？有点难开口。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe because the two of us being there would make them feel awkward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许是因为我们两个同时在场会让他们觉得很尴尬吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Was that gonna be awkward? I mean, what are you guys gonna talk about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那会不会很尴尬呢？ 你们要聊些什么呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I think you look great. Yeah, I'm back. Hi, Bruce. Nat. This is awkward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得你们看上去很棒。是啊，我回来了。你好啊，布鲁斯。小娜。好尴尬。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 困难的；棘手的；尴尬的；笨拙的；不雅的；不适的；不讲理的；不合作的；反常的

sense_info_list.en: causing or feeling embarrassment or inconvenience; socially uncomfortable
sense_info_list.zh: 令人不适的; 尴尬的

examination_example.sentence: If you're faced with an <highlight>awkward</highlight> silence at a dinner party, give the host a compliment (赞扬).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在晚宴上面对尴尬的沉默，就赞美一下主人吧。

examination_example.sentence: There was a time when people may have felt <highlight>awkward</highlight> about asking for a table for one, but those days are over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 曾经会因为一个人坐一桌吃饭而尴尬的日子已经一去不复返了。

examination_example.sentence: It's more likely that none of us start a conversation because it's <highlight>awkward</highlight> and challenging, or we think it's annoying and unnecessary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中没有一个人开始对话，更可能是因为它很尴尬，有挑战性，或者我们认为它很烦人，没有必要。
